verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> said he <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G418><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> that offences <S%G4625><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto him, through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%>!

It were better <S%G3081><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G1487><s%> a millstone <S%G3458><s%> <S%G3684><s%> were hanged <S%G4029><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> neck <S%G5137><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he cast <S%G4496><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should offend <S%G4624><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> little ones <S%G3398><s%>.

Take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%>: If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> trespass <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he repent <S%G3340><s%>, forgive <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he trespass <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> seven times <S%G2034><s%> in a day <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seven times <S%G2034><s%> in a day <S%G2250><s%> turn again <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, I repent <S%G3340><s%>; thou shalt forgive <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Increase <S%G4369><s%> our <S%G2254><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> ye had <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed <S%G4615><s%>, ye might <S%G302><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto this <S%G5026><s%> sycamine <S%G4807><s%> tree, Be thou plucked up by the root <S%G1610><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be thou planted <S%G5452><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it should <S%G302><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> plowing <S%G722><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> feeding cattle <S%G4165><s%>, will say <S%G2046><s%> unto him <S%G3739><s%> by and by <S%G2112><s%>, when he is come <S%G1525><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the field <S%G68><s%>, Go <S%G3928><s%> and sit down to meat <S%G377><s%>?

And <S%G235><s%> will not <S%G3780><s%> rather say <S%G2046><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Make ready <S%G2090><s%> wherewith <S%G5101><s%> I may sup <S%G1172><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gird thyself <S%G4024><s%>, and serve <S%G1247><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> I have eaten <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunken <S%G4095><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt eat <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%>?

<S%G3361><s%> Doth he <S%G2192><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> the things that were commanded <S%G1299><s%> him <S%G846><s%>? I trow <S%G1380><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall have done <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those things which are commanded <S%G1299><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, say <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> We are <S%G2070><s%> unprofitable <S%G888><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>: <S%G3754><s%> we have done <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> was our duty <S%G3784><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, that <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of Samaria <S%G4540><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village <S%G2968><s%>, there met <S%G528><s%> him <S%G846><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> men <S%G435><s%> that were lepers <S%G3015><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> afar off <S%G4207><s%>:
And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> lifted up <S%G142><s%> their voices <S%G5456><s%>, and said <S%G3004><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Master <S%G1988><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us <S%G2248><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> them, he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G4198><s%> shew <S%G1925><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> unto the priests <S%G2409><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that, as they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G5217><s%> <S%G1722><s%>, they were cleansed <S%G2511><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, when he saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was healed <S%G2390><s%>, turned back <S%G5290><s%>, and with <S%G3326><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, giving <S%G2168><s%> him <S%G846><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a Samaritan <S%G4541><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Were there <S%G2511><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> cleansed <S%G2511><s%>? but <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are the nine <S%G1767><s%>?

There are <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> that returned <S%G5290><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>, save <S%G1508><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> stranger <S%G241><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Arise <S%G450><s%>, go thy way <S%G4198><s%>: thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> hath made <S%G4982><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> whole <S%G4982><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he was demanded <S%G1905><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, when <S%G4219><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%>, he answered <S%G611><s%> them <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> observation <S%G3907><s%>: with: or, with outward shew

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, The days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> ye shall desire <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall <S%G3700><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G3700><s%> it.

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall say <S%G2046><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, See <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>; or <S%G2228><s%>, see <S%G2400><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>: go <S%G565><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G565><s%> them, nor <S%G3366><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> them.

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the lightning <S%G796><s%>, that lighteneth <S%G797><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the one part under <S%G5259><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, shineth <S%G2989><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the other part under <S%G5259><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> he <S%G846><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be rejected <S%G593><s%> of <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noe <S%G3575><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be <S%G2071><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>.

They did eat <S%G2068><s%>, they drank <S%G4095><s%>, they married wives <S%G1060><s%>, they were given in marriage <S%G1547><s%>, until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Noe <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ark <S%G2787><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all <S%G537><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Lot <S%G3091><s%>; they did eat <S%G2068><s%>, they drank <S%G4095><s%>, they bought <S%G59><s%>, they sold <S%G4453><s%>, they planted <S%G5452><s%>, they builded <S%G3618><s%>;

But <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> the same day <S%G2250><s%> that Lot <S%G3091><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> it rained <S%G1026><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them all <S%G537><s%>.
Even <S%G2596><s%> thus <S%G5024><s%> shall it be <S%G2071><s%> in the day <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2250><s%> when the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is revealed <S%G601><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, he which <S%G3739><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the housetop <S%G1430><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> stuff <S%G4632><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, let <S%G2597><s%> him not <S%G3361><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> it <S%G846><s%> away <S%G142><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that is in <S%G1722><s%> the field <S%G68><s%>, let him <S%G1994><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> return <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3694><s%>.
Remember <S%G3421><s%> Lot's <S%G3091><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall seek <S%G2212><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life shall preserve <S%G2225><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

Two <S%G1417><s%> men shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field <S%G68><s%>; the one <S%G1520><s%> shall be taken <S%G3880><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> left <S%G863><s%>. this verse is not found in most of the Greek copies

And <S%G2532><s%> they answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Where <S%G4226><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>?
